original_text: Receive these silver coins from the Israelites. Use the money to take care of the Tent of Meeting. Then the Lord will always remember that you belong to him. You have paid money for your lives.’
korean_text: 너는 이스라엘 자손에게서 속전을 취하여 회막 봉사에 쓰라 이것이 여호와 앞에서 이스라엘 자손의 기념이 되어서 너희의 생명을 대속하리라

sentences.original_text: Receive these silver coins from the Israelites.
Use the money to take care of the Tent of Meeting.
Then the Lord will always remember
You have paid money for your lives.'
